name: Sword of Ezera
loreDescription: "Because the color and shape is different to the holy sword wielded by the real life Ezeran legend..."
The final part of the etching on the sword's hilt has been lost to time, but a mysterious force can still be felt flowing through the blade.

skillDescription.base: Decreases damage suffered by the caster from Elite or Boss monsters by 15.0%. When this effect is granted more than once, only the strongest effect is applied.
skillDescription.max: Decreases damage suffered by the caster from Elite or Boss monsters by 30.0%. When this effect is granted more than once, only the strongest effect is applied.
